The original, nature, and immortality of the soul a poem : with an introduction concerning humane knowledge / written by Sir John Davies ... ; with a prefatory account concerning the author and poem. Nosce teipsum Davies, John, Sir, 1569-1626. Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715.
[32], 108 p.
Printed for W. Rogers ..., London : 1697.
Epistle dedicatory signed by the editor: N. Tate. Originally published in 1599 with title: Nosce teipsum. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
=======

[32], 108 p.
Printed for W. Rogers ..., London : 1697.
